Mechanical Claw.name: Mechanical Claw
Mechanical Claw.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ([[/r 1d6 + 2]]) slashing damage.

Dragonling Breath.name: Dragonling Breath
Dragonling Breath.description: The wyvern expends 3 charges and exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Reconstitute.name: Reconstitute
Reconstitute.description: The wyvern expends 1 charge, regaining [[/r 2d6 + 3]] hit points.

Afterburners.name: Afterburners
Afterburners.description: The wyvern can use a bonus action to expend 1 charge and double its flying speed until the start of its next turn.

Fuel.name: Fuel
Fuel.description: Over the course of 8 hours (which can be done as part of a long rest), the wyvern can consume high-quality charcoal worth at least 1 gp to regain [[/r 1d4 + 2]] expended charges. If the wyvern drops to 0 charges, it falls prone and unconscious until it is recharged in this manner.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The wyvern is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The wyvern has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
